channel.title: CVE Feed for Foscan -- Foscam C1 Webcam
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Foscan -- Foscam C1 Webcam

item.title: CVE-2016-8731|2024-08-06T02:27:41.251Z -- foscan -- foscam%20c1%20webcam
item.description: Hard-coded FTP credentials (r:r) are included in the Foscam C1 running firmware 1.9.1.12. Knowledge of these credentials would allow remote access to any cameras found on the internet that do not have port 50021 blocked by an intermediate device.
